app.name: BDH FreeRTOS with Capsense Slider Template
app.category: BDH Academy - EAST Park (Burapha Univ. - Infineon)
app.description: This template provide a starting point for BDH Shell with Infineon Capsense slider and LED task.

app.name: BDH FreeRTOS with Capsense Slider Template
app.category: BDH Academy - EAST Park (Burapha Univ. - Infineon)
app.description: This template provide a starting point for FreeRTOS with Infineon Capsense slider and LED task.

app.name: BDH FreeRTOS with BDH Shell - WiFi - MQTT Template
app.category: BDH Academy - EAST Park (Burapha Univ. - Infineon)
app.description: This template provide a starting point for FreeRTOS projects. Including a starting blinking LED task , Wifi connnect, MQTT client and the BDH shell task

app.name: BDH Bosch's BMI160 Motion Sensor with FreeRTOS Template
app.category: BDH Academy - EAST Park (Burapha Univ. - Infineon)
app.description: This template provide a starting point for Bosch's BMI160 Motion sensor via i2c interfacing and FreeRTOS support.

app.name: BDH Machine Learning - Gesture classification Template
app.category: BDH Academy - EAST Park (Burapha Univ. - Infineon)
app.description: This code example demonstrates how to perform gesture classification based on motion sensor (accelerometer and gyroscope) data. The code example comes with a pre-trained model that classifies the following gestures: circle, square, and side-to-side.
